> Janna - Is currently weak in regular play (especially versus historic expectations). Pro play's also light on enchanters. We're testing a light buff to her passive conversion. Don't want to over buff, but interested in seeing if we can get a bit more niche variety at least in the support position. Buffing the amount of damage her AAs and W get from movement speed's what we're looking at because those are aspects of her kit that tend to have more impact at higher skill levels and Janna's historically overperformed at low/average MMR versus high.

This statement makes me think of "Of Mice and Men" and how Riot acts when it comes to Janna is so stupid and unhealthy that we need to put whoever suggest Janna buffs down like George did to Lennie.

janna has 50% winrate. lets buff her. because shes "supposed to have a high winrate"

ridiculous

> Janna - Is currently weak in regular play (especially versus historic expectations). Pro play's also light on enchanters. We're testing a light buff to her passive conversion. Don't want to over buff, but interested in seeing if we can get a bit more niche variety at least in the support position. Buffing the amount of damage her AAs and W get from movement speed's what we're looking at because those are aspects of her kit that tend to have more impact at higher skill levels and Janna's historically overperformed at low/average MMR versus high.

***

> This beyond idiotic statement makes me think of "Of Mice and Men" and how Riot acts when it comes to Janna is so stupid and unhealthy [...]
Because buffing Zyra would be as bad as buffing Zed right now.

Power shifting is not the same as buffing. The plant hp change had no impact on support whatsoever. It still takes an ADC the same number of attacks or abilities to kill a plant as it did before.

The point was to buff her in mid lane, but all the plant hp nerf did was make her hard mid matchups impossible and her late game non-existent.

> The point was to buff her in mid lane, but all the plant hp nerf did was make her hard mid matchups impossible and her late game non-existent.

If you want late game power, then her early needs gutting.

Having a great early game, great mid game and a good late game on top of that is a balance problem.
Or they could just revert the change to plants and put her back to exactly how she was before preseason?

Riot just introduced a lot of _bugs_ for Zyra - not _buffs_. And Riot dodges removing the **bugs** for 2 months now. This cost Zyra 2% winrate.


That is far from being _bufffed_. She is actually nerfed right now.

It's also a mathematical fact that she lost ~15% of her damage in preseason compared to a full mpen rune page in season 7. 

And yes, that accounts for MR runes, new runes, old masteries, etc.
